```{r load libraries}
library("ggplot2")
library("magrittr")
```

## My plot

```{r load dataset}
coal_cons.df <- (
  read.csv("coal_consumption_per_cap.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
)

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = coal_cons.df, aes(color = country)) +
  theme_classic() +
  geom_line(aes(x = year, y = coal_cons))

```
